The investigator record patient ' airway data demographic variable . All patient premeditate midazolam . Cormac-Lehan grade video laryngoscope record also . We record optimization maneuver ( like handle force , reinserting , cricoid pressure ) . Bloodstaining device removal record mucosal damage . Teeth , tongue , lip damage also record . Sore throat , bronchospasm , wheeze recored recovery unit .
